sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be open on 2/15 and 2/16.  Golf course and Shelden Trails are currently groomed.  Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 18, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  For today, February 17, 2025 grooming for classic ski and skate ski will take place on Coyote Run and Hawks Hill while Cedar Trace will be rolled only.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Good snow coverage but strong north winds making it a little cool out on the open trails. Nice in the wood protected area. Classic tracks and skating lines were in good shape where protected from the wind. Kudos to the ski centre staff for doing such a great job with rentals, snack bar and general advice on a fairly busy day. Huron Meadows deserves a lot of credit for keeping cross country skiing going in the Metro Detroit area.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Being the very first on the groom today , I am biased : but boy oh boy it is nice at Nubs Nob ! LF 6

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow, and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and groomed wide for skating with a classic track.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold and beautiful morning at Nub's Nob with excellent snow. Nub's received a few more inches of natural snow yesterday and we have now had ten and a half feet of natural snow fall so far this ski season. It looks like we may see some sunshine on the slopes this morning with clear skies to start the day. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 PM to prepare for night skiing. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
